direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve managing hashrate resale configurations, with one creating and the other canceling the configuration.
The hashrateResaleDetail method retrieves details of a hashrate resale configuration, which is directly related to the cancellation process managed by cancelHashrateResaleConfig.
Both methods access and manipulate hashrate resale configurations, with hashrateResaleList listing existing configurations and cancelHashrateResaleConfig managing their lifecycle.
Both methods handle exceptions related to mining operations, although they serve different purposes (one for statistics and the other for configuration management).
Both methods involve similar parameter checking and request handling structures, though they operate on different mining-related resources.
